comments.author: Mohammad Anees
comments.content:
Wazir Saheb we were once at ITTI for settlement of its dues with HBL. Iftikhar Saheb was also with us he gave me his tele phone number and e-mail I.D. and stated that I can contact him at Canada at any time for any help regarding anything. I just want to contact with him for admission of my neiece at there. Would you help me for contacting Iftikhar Saheb. Want to know his Tele No.

Anees from Habib Bank
